thread.section_title: Alpha Flight Guru Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Alpha Flight Guru | alphaflightguru.com | 4 of 65
thread.title: Ariela
thread.title_full: Alpha Flight Guru reviewed by Ariela

author: Ariela
title: Ariela
text:
Raine in her great friendly manner. did her utmost to assist and create a good booking with a fair price in Business Class, the rest was "painful" - trying to get seats confirmed should not take days...and getting a hotel voucher for the wrong dates could not be accepted.
Your ticketing agents needs to have an "eye for details", and complete a booking in relative good timing.
Thank you Raine, you did well for me and i appreciate it. I will come back for future bookings and tell friends to contact you for their travel needs.
